method.text: Place the ingredients in a large heavy-based pan. Heat gently for 5-8 min until sugar has dissolved.

Bring to the boil without stirring. Then remove from heat and cool for 10-15 min or until it reaches the 'soft ball stage' at , stirring occasionally, to prevent sticking. Carefully whisk the mixture until it just starts to stiffen.
Pour into an oiled 18 cm shallow square cake tin. Smooth over the surface. Leave for about 5-10 min, until almost set. With a sharp knife mark the fudge into squares. Leave to cool completely.
Remove from tin. Store for up to 3 weeks in an airtight container.
